entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 March 2023
